mapper.sql: USER_ID, USER_NAME, PASSWORD, PROVINCE_CODE, CITY_CODE, COUNTY_CODE, COMPANY_NAME, USER_EMAIL, USER_PHONE, USER_VALIDITY, ADD_TIME, USER_ACCOUNT
mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID, USER_NAME, PROVINCE_CODE, CITY_CODE, COUNTY_CODE, COMPANY_NAME, USER_EMAIL, USER_PHONE, USER_VALIDITY,USER_ACCOUNT FROM T_USER

SELECT USER_ID, USER_NAME, PROVINCE_CODE, CITY_CODE, COUNTY_CODE, COMPANY_NAME, USER_EMAIL, USER_PHONE, USER_VALIDITY,USER_ACCOUNT FROM T_USER WHERE USER_ACCOUNT=#{userAccount,jdbcType=OTHER} AND PASSWORD=#{passWord,jdbcType=OTHER}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T_USER WHERE USER_ACCOUNT=#{_parameter,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND USER_VALIDITY>sysdate
mapper.insert:
insert into T_USER
USER_ID,
USER_NAME,
PASSWORD,
PROVINCE_CODE,
CITY_CODE,
COUNTY_CODE,
COMPANY_NAME,
USER_EMAIL,
USER_PHONE,
USER_VALIDITY,
ADD_TIME,
USER_ACCOUNT,
#{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{userName,jdbcType=OTHER},
#{password,jdbcType=OTHER},
#{provinceCode,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{cityCode,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

#{companyName,jdbcType=OTHER},
#{userEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{userPhone,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{userValidity,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

#{userAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update T_USER
USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=OTHER},
PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=OTHER},
PROVINCE_CODE = #{provinceCode,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CITY_CODE = #{cityCode,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
COUNTY_CODE = #{countyCode,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
COMPANY_NAME = #{companyName,jdbcType=OTHER},
USER_EMAIL = #{userEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_PHONE = #{userPhone,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
USER_VALIDITY = #{userValidity,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ADD_TIME = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
USER_ACCOUNT = #{userAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update T_USER set USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=OTHER}, PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=OTHER}, PROVINCE_CODE = #{provinceCode,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CITY_CODE = #{cityCode,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, COUNTY_CODE = #{countyCode,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, COMPANY_NAME = #{companyName,jdbcType=OTHER}, USER_EMAIL = #{userEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_PHONE = #{userPhone,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, USER_VALIDITY = #{userValidity,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ADD_TIME = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, USER_ACCOUNT = #{userAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
